localizedText.DESC_CONTACTS: Emails that belong to the Let's Encrypt account
localizedText.descInterval: Timespan between certificate validity and new certificate generation
localizedText.descIntervalStaging: Timespan between certificate validity and new certificate generation (Staging API)
localizedText.WRONG_PORT_CONFIGURATION: Certificate generation stopped: Endpoints https://0.0.0.0:443 and http://0.0.0.0:80 must be configured
localizedText.RESTART_REQUIRED: Restart required to set current server certificate
localizedText.ERROR_GET_CERTIFICATE_EMPTY_DOMAIN: Getting the current certificate failed: Domain must not be empty
localizedText.ERROR_GET_CERTIFICATE: Getting the current certificate failed: GET {0} failed with error [{1}]
localizedText.ERROR_CREATE_CERTIFICATE: A new certificate could not be created: {0}
localizedText.ERROR_REVOKE_CERTIFICATE: The current certificate can't be revoked, because the key is unknown
